Haha i always enjoyed your sense of humour and the way you show it in the little clips 😂 honestly loved this video, it’s so important to be healthy while traveling. Thanks for the tips!! And you look especially gorgeous here!

I hate getting sick while traveling!  I was lucky enough to not get seriously ill while I was on my travels over the years.  However, I do get scared of eating some street food in more unsanitary areas because of food borne illnesses. I've had a few times when I ate something bad and got bad stomach aches and needed the bathroom constantly, which sucks when you can't find a restroom when you are out!

We need to learn how to not get sick while traveling full time. We've been so sick! One thing we've figured out is that we keep catching something at the swimming pool. I wish we could get enough sleep. That's what ran us to the ground. We just don't have enough time to get a full night's sleep. Thanks for the tips!
Hopefully these tips help. They hace also helper me when traveling full time. I think its important specifically for full time travelers to take days off and get good sleep.

There is something called Normaflore/Enterogermina made by Sanofi. I swear by it, I use this when abroad to keep diarrhoea and food poisoning at bay. Since I discovered it I Never go abroad without it!
